message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $145.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $130 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $138?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can do $132 for the product.
